reviews.sentence: Perfect location good service ok rooms. We stayed at this hotel one night with our child. The location of the hotel is great within walking distance of the fantastic new Markthal Blak station and the cube houses. there is a public parking garage right in front of the hotel. The staff was nice and very helpful and the breakfast buffet was great. As for the downsides of this hotel it is located in a residential area with little interesting views from the rooms or the restaurant area. The rooms and facilities are pretty outdated with separate beds a desk in the middle of the room and an old bathroom. it is a hotel to sleep not to spend time in the room. For us a good experience and definitely good quality for the relatively low price. If you want something fancy keep looking.

do not stay here it is damp and mouldy. Nothing. The fact that we had a mouldy and damp room. The towels were all smelling. Even the manager was appalled. You could not sit on the toilet as the door did not close. No mirror. In room fridge was warm. We was given the 7th floor with a very frightening view. As we were on the roof. Kids had access to the door.

Great location friendly staff excellent value for money. Excellent value for money friendly and helpful staff fantastic location easy parking in streets around the hotel parking opposite hotel 24 hrs 21 euro. Spacious room with good size desk and armchair. Cupboards and nightstand have no doors or drawers so it is impossible to store belongings out of sight. Free wifi in lobby but in the rooms you pay 15 euro for 24 hrs hardly unreasonable in view of the room rates.

I would go back there next time. Breakfast buffet so good and plenty of choice. The double bed is two single beds joined and its not comfortable. The photos indicated there would be a balcony which was not the case. We have been told that it was an option to pay for but we did not see it on the website while booking.

Decent if dated place to stay kind staff. Staff were very kind and professional. The gym was poorly equipedThe restaurant was understaffed lacked options for breakfastRom had refrigerator but no microwave. Overall the hotel seemed dated in need of refresh.

Basic but pleasant. I came to the hotel on my husbands business trip. The rooms were basic but had most things you need to make the stay pleasant. I must say the bed was extremely comfortable. Although there were minor things that were slightly inconvenient like the lack of plug sockets by the bed. More of a corporate business stay with simpleRoms suitable for around a nights stay.

good value for money stay. Breakfast selection was good. Hotel location is good. Staff were friendly and check in was very easy. Scrambled eggs were rock solid both days but plenty of other things to choose from. Room could have done with window blinds nets due to proximity of buildings next door.

Normal. No surprise when entering the room not too small. I paid about HK750 45 city tax. Price is acceptable due to high hotel fee in Holland. Have air conditioning supplied but no daily cleaning service. The location is good. It is within 10 minutes to walk to the Marthal and the Cubic houses and the Pencil Building. There is a supermarket nearby and some eateries.

Wonderful. The location is superb. The staff are helpful and friendly. The air conditioning is brilliant and it is a real advantage to have a nice fridge in the room too. Kettle and coffee machine provided in the room fabulous. ❤ ️ The room could have done with a bit of upgrading the safe would not lock this was reported and fixed the same day though. the toilet seat was loose the shower fixture was coming away from the the wall the vanity mirror did not illuminate. The double bed was actually two singles pushed together with just a thin mattress topper across the two single mattresses the two beds kept drifting apart.

It was a good place to see around rotterdam but stay could have been more comfortable. The location was great being close to the cube house and blak metro station. Water was not draining out in the washbasin and the electric kettle was rusty. Although we had informed the hotel staff nothing was done till our check out day. In case you face any issues try to inform the housekeeping staff directly instead of the reception.
Good Cleanliness and location. B fast was really poor. No selection. Low grade productsReceptionist not even check the actual reservation to give an accurate reply.

Good location. our over all experience were good polite staff and very good location. close to the hotel there are good resturant and metro and tram are next to hotel. are room was tiny or small but it was ok and we could live with it. They did not change the towels when cleaned the room tv did not work and there were no telephone. Staff were friendly and the hotel it self rented bicycles.
Exceptional. Loved the record player and choice of music.

Good stay but noisy rooms. well positionedvery noisy hotel walls are very thin and all rumors from the corridors could be heared at any time nights includedbreakfast is expensive compared to the offering.

This hotel has been rebuilt from the ground. New floors tiles walls bathrooms carpets. everything. Looks great and definitely worth a visit. Good and comfortable beds airco bed reading lights which even include a usb charger. Loved to be here again. Great service and staff. Would love to come again.
Our stay was great. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Beds were very comfortable and good size room. No bottled water in the room.

Good. Everything was very good. Good service nice room good location. Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The system with de computers was very useful and user friendly. Paying your parking ticket at the hotel is very easy.
Good. Great location and good value for money but nothing too special. We got the room close to exit and the elevator and it was pretty noisy.

Comfy beds and grest location. Comfy beds great location easy access to tram metro and buses. Markthal and R’dam Tues Sat market within a few mins walking distance. No hotel parking. Pricy neighbourhood for street parking or parking lot.

Perfect hotel for a Rotterdam city trip. Fantastic bed quiet and a nice spacious bathroom. Modern clean. Those are the important elements that make for a great hotel and this is definitely the case at Savoy. On top of that a super friendly staff that makes you feel very welcome upon arrival and checkout. The hotel offers all facilities we are looking for when we are city tripin. Great location right in the center of the city but still nice and quiet. Great restaurant Pazo or something at walking distance by the way. This hotel surely is a good choice for a pleasant stay in Rotterdam.
